description: Detects suspicious execution of Regasm/Regsvcs utilities
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Regasm/Regsvcs Suspicious Execution
query: (((((process.executable.text:("*\\Regsvcs.exe" OR "*\\Regasm.exe")) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("RegSvcs.exe" OR "RegAsm.exe"))) AND process.command_line.text:("*\\Users\\Public\\*" OR "*\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\*" OR "*\\Desktop\\*" OR "*\\Downloads\\*" OR "*\\PerfLogs\\*" OR "*\\Windows\\Temp\\*" OR "*\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Start\ Menu\\Programs\\Startup\\*"))) OR ((((process.executable.text:("*\\Regsvcs.exe" OR "*\\Regasm.exe")) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("RegSvcs.exe" OR "RegAsm.exe"))) AND (NOT ((process.command_line.text:"*.dll*") OR (process.command_line.text:("*\\Regasm.exe\"" OR "*\\Regasm.exe" OR "*\\Regsvcs.exe\"" OR "*\\Regsvcs.exe")))))))
